title: Discover the Top 10 Emission Reduction Technology Trends in 2023 - StartUs Insights
summary: Green innovation is becoming increasingly important for businesses as they face pressure to reduce their environmental impact. This is leading to the development of new technologies and practices that can help businesses reduce their emissions and improve their sustainability. Startups across the world are using artificial intelligence, big data, and the internet of things to develop solutions that monitor and analyze emission data and offer insights into abatement strategies.

title: McCormick freshens up red-cap business with new look, bottle - FoodNavigator-USA.com
summary: McCormick & Company redesigned its iconic spice bottles to make the contents more visible to consumers and easier to handle. The new bottles are also made from 50% recycled plastic, making them more environmentally friendly. The company says that the new design will help to attract and retain customers.
